title: Advanced Mathematical Thinking Enhancement Program Using the Integrated 5P-5E Model (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of College-Level Foundational Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra)
context.additional_context: Utilization of digital whiteboards and collaboration tools to enhance interaction in real-time online environments

learning_goals: Learners design mathematical problem-solving processes applying the 5P Model's five stages (Plan-Play-Produce-Present-Reflect)
Learners apply creative thinking strategies based on the 5E Model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) to mathematical research
Learners quantitatively evaluate academic achievement, creativity, and research characteristics using experimental-control group comparative methodologies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
